# Copilot Instructions

This repository contains a GitHub Pages static website hosted at [rh7.ninja](https://rh7.ninja).

## Repository Overview

- **Type**: Static website (GitHub Pages)
- **Domain**: rh7.ninja (configured via CNAME)
- **Primary Language**: HTML

## Guidelines for Contributions

- Keep the website simple and lightweight
- Use semantic HTML elements where appropriate
- Ensure all changes are compatible with GitHub Pages hosting
- Test any HTML changes for proper rendering across browsers
- Maintain accessibility standards (use alt text for images, proper heading hierarchy, etc.)
